item.title: All Swedish Apps You Must Have
item.description: Must Know Swedish Verbs List Must Know Swedish Verbs List Including 4 types for each verbs, realtime search and direct popup in SAOL. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.autotechnavi.app.sfiverb SFB-SWEDISH FOR BEGINNER SFB-SWEDISH FOR BEGINNER All aspects of Swedish for beginners including grammars, vocabulary, pronounciations, and more … https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.autotechnavi.swedish.swedishforbeginnersSFI Wordlist Rivstart A1+A2 Wordlist Rivstart A1+A2 https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.autotechnavi.app.rivstartwordlist A useful dictionary of Rivstart book when you are using it. Other Smartphone apps Must Known Swedish Verbs List SFB-SWEDISH FOR BEGINNER Wordlist Rivstart A1+A2 Svenska Akademiens ordlista

item.title: Useful Resources and Links for Swedish Learners
item.description: Resources Android apps Digital lexicons & dictionaries Vocabulary and lists Corpus tools Podcasts Youtube Online courses Websites Communities Blogs Digital books Physical books Smartphone apps Online bookstores News outlets Television Radio Resources Here follows an index of useful resources that might help you on your way to mastering Swedish. Android apps Must Known Swedish Verbs List SFB-SWEDISH FOR BEGINNER Wordlist Rivstart A1+A2 Digital lexicons & dictionaries Svenska.se Three official monolingual Swedish dictionaries in one website: use SAOL for spelling and inflections, and SO for definitions, pronunciations and etymology.
